EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Linda, Hope you are doing well. I just wanted to follow up on this message. If you would still like to schedule a time to speak you may do so at your convenience by clicking here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Friday, January 25, 2013 7:51 PM To: lllround@yahoo.com Cc: Sara Conde Subject: Follow up on message Hi Linda, My name is Nicolette and I am backing up Sara Conde while she is out of the office on vacation. I wanted to follow up with you as I noticed you sent her a message on LinkedIn about setting up a time to speak about MBO. I would be happy to speak with you next week sometime and you may access my online calendar by clicking here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd11Vp0hj5fi5O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. If you would like to wait to speak with Sara until she is back in the office the week of February 4th that is fine as well. Have a great weekend!Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&bbentley@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd11Vp0hj5fi5O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd11Vp0hj5fi5O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
